sentences: Jonas Petter Berggren (born 21 March 1967) is a Swedish musician and singer-songwriter and record producer, also known as Joker.
He was born in Gothenburg, Sweden.
Jonas was born with a cleft lip, undergoing three surgeries within his first year.
"Everytime It Rains" (B. Steinberg, R. Nowels, M. Vidal)
"Cruel Summer" (Cover: S. Dallin, S. Fahey, S. Jolley, A. Swain & K. Woodward)
He married Norwegian hairdresser Birthe Haugland on 12 July 2000 whom he met during a cruise in Norway in the summer of 1996.
Together they have four children: Julia, born in 1999, Gabriel, born in 2001, Amanda, born in 2006, and Molly, born in 2008.
